content: I feel the part about leading as an introvert. I was in a similar spot some years ago ( much smaller team, though) and it took me a long time to figure out how to keep my energy up. Your solution is simple and elegant, I wish I had taken up walking back then. I wonder: do you meet any resistance when carving out that “alone time”? How do you avoid feeling guilty when you inevitably have to say “no” to demands on your time? Thanks for the read, was interesting and insightful.
